Performer:
Tsuruzawa Dōhachi II (see also Tsuruzawa Tokutarō) (鶴沢道八 (二))

Alternate Name: Tsuruzawa Tokutarō (鶴沢徳太郎)

Dates: '1970-'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
